title: 服务器太卡了，怎么办啊
author: Mcxixif

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
经济插件在玩家加入服务器时消耗时长过多
推荐更换GemsEconomy

replies.author: 小张up
replies.txt_content: AConomy的问题，建议换一个高性能的插件

replies.author: Mcxixif
replies.txt_content:
